tha-ap393:5.2: pahaṃsitvāna mānasaṃ → sampahaṃsitva mānasaṃ (bj) | sampahaṃsitvā mānasaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:22.1: Osadhañjananāḷī ca → osathaṃ añjanāpica (sya1ed, sya2ed) | osadhaṃ jananāliṃ ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:31.3: Biḷaṅgaloṇaṃ pahūtañca → bilaṅgaloṇabhūtañca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | bilaṅgaloṇaṃ bhūtaṃ ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:33.4: mahesino → mahesinaṃ (si) | mahāyasaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mahissaraṃ (mr)
tha-ap393:43.2: yācittho tathāgataṃ → ayācito tathāgato (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | ayācittho tathāgataṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:46.3: Yathāsaṇṭhaṃ → yathāsantaṃ (bj) | yathā saṇhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yathāsaṇhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:75.3: sumbhakaṃ → pubbakaṃ (bj) | sambhataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pupphakaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | mattikaṃ (?)
tha-ap393:90.1: yadā chāyaṃ → yadā vāyaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | yadā cāyaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:94.1: Pilindavacchanāmena → pilindivacchanāmena (bj) | pilindavaccho nāmena (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:97.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayissati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap393:101.1: Chatte ca sugate datvā → chatte sugate datvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:139.2: datvā dhammakaruttame → datvā sugate dhammakuttare (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | datvā saṅghe gaṇuttame (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:150.1: Saddhamme gādhaṃ → cetoñāṇañca (bj) | saddhamme gāḷhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap393:175.1: Niyāmaṃ sati dhāvanti → niyāmaṃ patidhāvanti (bj) | niyamaṃ paṭidhāvantī (si) | niyāmaṃ paṭidhāvanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | niyamaṃ paṭidhāvanti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:183.5: Khalitampi → khalitaṃ maṃ (si, mr) | calitaṃ maṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:199.1: Dīpadhāre → dīpaṭṭhāne (bj) | dīpadāne (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dīpathāle (pts-vp-pli1ed) | dīpaṭṭhāpe (mr)
tha-ap393:203.1: Sugutto → sadā gutto (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | tadā gutto (sya1ed, sya2ed) | saṃgutto (mr)
tha-ap393:207.1: Malaharaṇiyo → añjananāḷiyo (bj) | hatthalīlaṅgake (sya1ed, sya2ed) | hatthī līlaṅgake (pts-vp-pli1ed) | hatthalilaṅgate (mr)
tha-ap393:223.2: kaṭṭissā → kaṭṭhissā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kaṭissā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kuṭṭakā (mr)
tha-ap393:231.3: ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upadahitvāna (bj) | ñāṇaṃ uppādayitvāna (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap393:233.3: ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upanetvā (bj) | tesu ñānaṃ upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
